titles.title: Medicare+Choice Stabilization and Improvement Act of 2001
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to stabilize and improve the Medicare+Choice Program.

bill.summary: Medicare+Choice Stabilization and Improvement Act of 2001 - Amends part C (Medicare+Choice) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to: (1) base the Medicare+Choice payment floor on fee-for-service payments; and (2) establish a limitation on the reduction in payment for graduate medical education.
